# Parenteser
## Regel
$$a(b+c)=ab+ac$$

## Eksempler

$$3(a+4)=3a+12$$

$$-(a+4)=-a-4$$

$$4-(a+4)=4-a-4=0$$

**OBS**: Et minustegn foran en parentes betragtes som om at a i reglen $a(b+c)=ab+ac$ er lig med -1, altså $-(b+c)=-b-c$.

## Opgaver

### Ophæv parenteserne:
$$
\begin{gather}
&
\begin{aligned}
&\text{a.} \ 2a-(b-a) \\
&\text{b.} \ 2-3(4-b) \\
&\text{c.} \ 3-(b+2) \\
\end{aligned}
& 
\begin{aligned}
&\text{d.} \ -(4+x) \\
&\text{e.} \ 7-(b+7) \\
&\text{f.} \ 2x-(9-x) \\
\end{aligned}
\end{gather}
$$

### Ophæv parenteserne og reducer:
$$
\begin{gather}
&
\begin{aligned}
& \text{a.} \ 2-(b+3)+1 \\
& \text{b.} \ 4+3(4-a)-16+3a \\
& \text{c.} \ 2(-4-x)+8+2x \\
& \text{d.} \ a-(b+a) \\
& \text{e.} \ 4-2(3-x)+2x \\
& \text{f.} \ 3-(b+2)-1 \\
& \text{g.} \ 8-(4+a)+a \\
& \text{h.} \ 21+3(b-7) \\
& \text{i.} \ 2b-(2-b)+2 \\
\end{aligned}
&
\begin{aligned}
& \text{j.} \ 3-(a+3)+a \\
& \text{k.} \ 4+3(2-x)-6+3x \\
& \text{l.} \ 3(-4-b)+4b+12 \\
& \text{m.} \ 3x-(4-x) \\
& \text{n.} \ b-3(b-3) \\
& \text{o.} \ y-(y+3)+2 \\
& \text{p.} \ b-(b+2a)+2a \\
& \text{q.} \ x-(5+x)+3 \\
& \text{r.} \ a+4(2-a)-2a \\
\end{aligned}
&
\begin{aligned}
& \text{s.} \ 3-(b+1)+2b \\
& \text{t.} \ 2(1-x)-4+2x \\
& \text{u.} \ 2+3(2-a)-3+2a \\
& \text{v.} \ 4-(b-3) \\
& \text{w.} \ c-4(2-c) \\
& \text{x.} \ 3-(b+2)+6 \\
& \text{y.} \ -(4-x) \\
& \text{z.} \ -6+2(b+3)
\end{aligned}
\end{gather}
$$

### Ophæv parenteserne og reducer:
$$
\begin{gather}
&
\begin{aligned}
& \text{a.} \ 2-x-(1-x) \\
& \text{b.} \ 1+4(x+1-5) \\
& \text{c.} \ 10+3(2-a)-6+3a \\
& \text{d.} \ 2(x-3)+8-(2-x) \\
& \text{e.} \ 2x-(3-x) \\
& \text{f.} \ a-3(a-2) \\

\end{aligned}
&
\begin{aligned}
& \text{h.} \ y-(y+x)+2x \\
& \text{i.} \ a-(6+a)+3 \\
& \text{j.} \ x+4(3-x)+3x \\
& \text{k.} \ 1-(b+1)+b \\
& \text{l.} \ 3(1-a)-6+2a \\
& \text{m.} \ 2(3-c)-8+3c \\
\end{aligned}
\end{gather}
$$
